segments.text: hey , you look great ! how's everything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , you know what ? I've been going to the club regularly . The training really pays off . Now I am in a good shape and I know more about how to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: really ? tell me about it . I haven't gone to the club for a long time . I am too busy with work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's important to do proper exercises .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you're right . Too much or too little won't do any good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the trainer tells me , besides regular sports activities , I should also have a healthy and balanced diet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we should eat more vegetables instead of junk food to stay energetic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: surely it is . Getting enough sleep is also crucial for fitness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've heard that . Does your trainer tell you anything about keeping fit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , he advises me to stay in a good mood . That can help one to keep sound physical health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think if you follow your trainer's advice , you'll be on the right track .
segments.speaker: S1
